org.soulwing.cdi.properties.spi

Interface PropertyConverter.Context

  • Enclosing interface:
    PropertyConverter

    public static interface PropertyConverter.Context
    A context for a property conversion.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Object convert(String value, Class<?> type)
      Converts a string representation of the given type to an instance of that type.
      Class<?> getTargetType()
      Gets the target type for requested conversion.
      String resolve(String name, String defaultValue)
      Resolves a property name to a value.

    • Method Detail

      • getTargetType

        Class<?> getTargetType()
        Gets the target type for requested conversion.
        Returns:
        target type (never null)

      • resolve

        String resolve(String name,
               String defaultValue)
        Resolves a property name to a value.
        Parameters:
        name - the name to resolve
        Returns:
        resolved value or defaultValue if the name could not be resolved

      • convert

        Object convert(String value,
               Class<?> type)
        Converts a string representation of the given type to an instance of that type.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        type - target type
        Returns:
        instance of type
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if value cannot be converted into an instance of type because it is syntactically invalid
        UnsupportedOperationException - if conversion to type is not supported by this context
